opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Appeal dismissed.
Mr. Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

casebody.head_matter:
Keiser, Appellant, v. Judicial Inquiry and Review Board.
Argued May 5, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Stanford Shmukler, with him Morton Witkm, for appellant.
Peter W. Brown, Assistant Attorney General, with him J. Shane Creamer, Attorney General, for appellees.
June 28, 1971:
